HDG.BC.content: “Ground-concepts” calls us to come to stand where a footing & a permanence are granted, where all decisions are made, but also where indecisiveness borrows its hiding places [relate to Derrida, undecidable]
HDG.BC.linkedContent: “Ground-concepts” calls us to come to stand where a footing & a permanence are granted, where all decisions are made, but also where indecisiveness borrows its hiding places [relate to Derrida, undecidable]
